title: AgroSEM 2012 (part of MTSR-2012)
description:
Metadata and Semantics for Agriculture, Food & Environment (AgroSEM)

5th international workshop

The 5th edition of the AgroSEM workshop is organized as a special track at  MTSR 2012, on Nov 28-30, 2012, in Cadiz, Spain. The workshop aims to bring together researchers and practitioners that are working on agricultural, food-related and environmental knowledge production, organization, and exchange from a Semantic Web perspective. At AgroSEM, interested experts present the results of their work, and establish liaisons with other groups that are working on related subjects. In addition, it aims to outline the rich potential of these subjects as an application field for advanced metadata- and semantic-driven systems and services.

More information on the AgroSEM workshop webpage.

organizer.organizer: Nikos Manouselis, Ioannis N. Athanasiadis, and Johannes Keizer
